name: Caprese Salad
description: A simple and refreshing salad made with sliced Roma tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil leaves, and a drizzle of balsamic glaze.
ingredients: 1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, torn or chopped
instructions: On a large serving platter or individual plates, arrange the sliced Roma tomatoes and mozzarella.
Sprinkle salt and pepper to taste.
Scatter the torn basil leaves over the tomatoes and mozzarella.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze.
Serve immediately.

name: Spicy Chicken Curry
description: A rich and hearty Indian curry made with chicken, tomatoes, and a blend of spices.
ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast, cut into pieces
instructions: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, and ginger, cooking until onion is translucent.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned on all sides.
Stir in diced tomatoes, curry powder, cayenne pepper, and salt. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

name: Vegan Black Bean Burger
description: A delicious and hearty vegan burger made from black beans and various vegetables, served on a whole grain bun.
ingredients: 2 cans (15 oz each) black beans, drained and rinsed
instructions: Mash black beans in a bowl until thick and pasty.
In a skillet, sauté bell pepper, onion, and garlic until soft.
Mix vegetables, beans, cumin, bread crumbs, salt, and pepper. Form into patties.
Grill or cook patties in a skillet until heated through and crispy on the outside.
Serve on buns with your choice of toppings.

name: Zucchini Noodle Pad Thai
description: A light and healthy version of the classic Thai dish, replacing rice noodles with spiralized zucchini.
ingredients: For the sauce: 2 tbsp tamarind paste, 2 tbsp fish sauce, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp brown sugar
instructions: Cook chicken in a skillet until fully cooked, set aside.
In the same skillet, add eggs and scramble, then set aside with chicken.
Sauté spiralized zucchini in the skillet for 1-2 minutes.
Add chicken, eggs, bean sprouts, and prepared sauce. Stir well and heat through.
Garnish with peanuts and green onions.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A rich and indulgent chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, perfect for a dessert treat.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Butter and flour four ramekins.
Melt chocolate and butter in a double boiler, stirring until smooth.
Whisk together eggs, egg yolks, and sugar, then gradually whisk in the melted chocolate mixture.
Stir in flour and vanilla until just combined.
Divide the batter among ramekins. Bake for 12-14 minutes.
Let stand for 1 minute, then invert onto plates and serve.
